function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Restricted spaces for aerobic exercise","Impact":"Limited opportunities for physical activity can lead to decreased fitness and health","Mitigation":"Use alternative methods for aerobic exercise that can be performed in restricted spaces","Technologies":"Treadmills, stationary bikes, rowing ergometers, heart rate monitors, telephone applications, wearable sensors","People":"Individuals with limited space for exercise","Owner":"Individuals, fitness centers, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Engagement in heavy aerobic and resistance training programs without adaptation","Impact":"Reduction in immune function and negative impact on the immune system","Mitigation":"Adapt exercise volume and intensity to reduce negative impact on the immune system, monitor training progression using telephone applications and wearable sensors","Technologies":"Wearable sensors, telephone applications","People":"Practitioners","Owner":"Fitness centers, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Participating in physical activity during a systemic viral infection","Impact":"Increased risk of sudden cardiac death due to inflammatory reaction in muscle cells and coronary artery walls","Mitigation":"Avoid physical activity during a systemic viral infection","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Individuals with viral infections","Owner":"Personal responsibility, healthcare providers"}]}
